speaker: Alex
message: Hey, you busy? Or can I steal a little of your time? 😉

speaker: May
message: Steal all you want. My time's yours anyway.

speaker: Alex
message: Careful, I might just take that literally. Could show up at your door right now. 😏

speaker: May
message: Don’t threaten me with a good time. You know I’d open that door in a heartbeat.

speaker: Alex
message: Is that so? Guess I should test that theory sometime soon.

speaker: May
message: Why test when you could just... show up? 😉

speaker: Alex
message: Careful, you're making me want to drop everything right now.

speaker: May
message: And what if I said I wouldn't mind? 😘

speaker: Alex
message: Then I guess I'd have no choice but to see you sooner than planned.

speaker: May
message: Oh, so you're all talk, huh? I thought you were more of an action-taker. 😏

speaker: Alex
message: Don’t tempt me. You know I’m just looking for an excuse.

speaker: May
message: Well, what if I said you don’t need one? The door's open... and so is my schedule. 🥰

speaker: Alex
message: You're playing a dangerous game. I might just have to win.

speaker: May
message: Who said anything about winning? Maybe I want to be caught. 😈

speaker: Alex
message: Is that so? Guess I'll have to see just how fast I can get there. 🚗💨

speaker: May
message: Better hurry. I might not wait forever. Or maybe I will... just to make you sweat.

speaker: Alex
message: Oh, you’re trouble, aren’t you? 😜

speaker: May
message: The best kind. And you love it.

speaker: Alex
message: Maybe I do. Maybe I can’t stop thinking about that smile of yours. 💖

speaker: May
message: Flatterer. But keep talking. I like where this is going. 💋

speaker: Alex
message: Oh, you haven’t heard the half of it yet... What if I told you I’ve been counting the days until I see you again?

speaker: May
message: Counting the days, huh? That’s sweet. But what else have you been imagining? 😏

speaker: Alex
message: Now you’re really trying to get me to confess. What if I said I’ve been imagining pulling you into my arms the second I see you?

speaker: May
message: Mmm... go on. I like the sound of that. 😘

speaker: Alex
message: And maybe trailing my fingers down your back, just to hear that little gasp you make when I surprise you.

speaker: May
message: You’re playing with fire, Alex. 🔥

speaker: Alex
message: Then maybe I should see if I can handle the heat... or if I need you to cool me down.

speaker: May
message: Careful... I might just take you up on that challenge. 😏

speaker: Alex
message: I hope you do. Because the next time I see you, there won’t be any holding back. 💋
